title: Development of a nanocomposite hydrogel catalyzed H2O2/TMB system for determination of chlordiazepoxide in exhaled breath condensate
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29143-29150
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03751K, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yasaman Sefid-Sefidehkhan, Zahra Karimzadeh, Abolghasem Jouyban, Maryam Khoubnasabjafari, Vahid Jouyban-Gharamaleki, Elaheh Rahimpour
In this study, an enzyme mimic catalyzed H2O2–tetramethylbenzidine system based on UiO-66/Au NPs–PVA nanocomposite hydrogel was employed as an optical probe for chlordiazepoxide sensing.
